Package model

Class User

java.lang.Object
model.User
public class User extends Object
This class represents a user of the library.

      public boolean addBookToCart(Book book)
      Adds a book to the shopping cart of the user.
      Parameters:
      book - the book object to be added to the cart
      Returns:
      true if the book was successfully added to the cart, false otherwise

    • deleteBookUser

      Deletes a book from the user's shopping cart based on the book name.
      Parameters:
      bookName - the name of the book to be deleted

    • buyBooksCart

      public boolean buyBooksCart()
      Buys the books in the shopping cart of the user if the user has enough money.
      Returns:
      true if the books were successfully bought, false otherwise

    • getBooks

      public Object[][] getBooks()
      Retrieves the books in the shopping cart of the user as a 2D array of Object.
      Returns:
      a 2D array of Object where each row represents a book and the first column contains the book's name and the second column contains the book's price.

    • getShoppingCart

      public ArrayList<Book> getShoppingCart()
      Returns the shopping cart of the user, which is an ArrayList of Book objects.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of Book objects representing the user's shopping cart
